pageContext.claim: “You wouldn't believe that's possible, but I know it's true because I've said it 50 times and the fakers back there, they've never corrected me. No, it's true. No, it's true. If I were slightly off, if it were, if I was off by two factories, there'd be a headline, Donald Trump told a fib. Donald Trump gets to be a Pinocchio again.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump would have been correct if he had only said 60,000 factories had disappeared since China joined the World Trade Organization. But he earned Two Pinocchios when he combined that figure with an exaggerated estimate for job losses and also suggested the only reason was trade with China.
